string.value: The Rememberer of Sleepywood claims to be studying the changes that are taking place with the strange-looking Horny Mushrooms and needs some help.

The Rememberer says that he must continue his research and that the raging Horny Mushrooms must be stopped in the meantime.


#o2110200# #a22471#
You helped the Remember of Sleepywood with his research again, but you better talk to him about the progress he's made in his studies on the strange mushrooms.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 8,000\r\nCan proceed to 'Understanding the Horny Mushroom Signals'\r\n

I've been diligently studying the Horny Mushroom Caps you have given me, but I keep getting reports that the Horny Mushrooms are causing major damage in the area. I think we'll need to put an end to this by hunting down a significant number of them. Can you please eliminate 80 Horny Mushrooms?
Great, thank you. I'll keep working on my research in the meantime.
Ah, really? I'll have to put my research on hold for now then and go survey the damaged area.
Oh great work. I just got done with my research, too. Please hold on for a bit.
I'm in the middle of my research on the Horny Mushroomsâ€¦
